def upload():
    username = request.form['username']
    file1 = request.files['file1']
    file2 = request.files['file2']
    os.mkdir(username)
    file1.save(f'{username}/{file1.filename}')
    file2.save(f'{username}/{file2.filename}')
    return "Files uploaded successfully"
